entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
